    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107322</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat conduction in icy waters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeübertragung im eisigen Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction de la chaleur dans les eaux glaciales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução do calor em águas geladas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione di calore in acque ghiacciate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή θερμότητας στα παγωμένα ύδατα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción del calor en aguas heladas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows how heat is conducted from the water, through the ice, and into the air above turning more water into ice.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gradient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Hitze vom Wasser, 
durch das Eis und in die Luft über dem Machen mehr Wassers zu Eis 
geleitet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre comment la chaleur est 
conduite de l'eau, par la glace, et dans l'air au-dessus de 
transformer plus d'eau en glace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra como o calor é conduzido da 
água, através do gelo, e no ar acima de girar mais água no gelo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra come il calore è condotto 
dall'acqua, attraverso il ghiaccio e nell'aria sopra trasformare in 
più acqua il ghiaccio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός επιδεικνύει πώς η θερμότητα 
διευθύνεται από το ύδωρ, μέσω του πάγου, και στον αέρα επάνω 
από τη μετατροπή περισσότερου ύδατος σε πάγο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra cómo el calor se conduce del 
agua, a través del hielo, y en el aire sobre dar vuelta a más agua 
en el hielo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
